long_description: With raw, understated fashion, the Spy Cutter Interchangeable Sunglasses offer technologically advanced performance for a wide range of outdoor activities and light conditions. Fast Track lens replacement system lets you customize your sunglasses when light conditions change; simply pop, pull and replace. Clear Smoke frames come with 2 pairs of lenses: bronze for bright sunlight and rose for filtered light and overcast conditions. Lenses are treated with a unique coating that repels moisture and oils, helping keep sweat and grease from clouding your vision. Lightweight Grilamid frames resist stress cracks and material fatigue, and stand up well against UV exposure and extreme temperatures. Patented Scoop ventilation system forces air through strategically placed vents to combat lens fogging. The Spy Cutter Interchangeable Sunglasses feature Hytrel rubber nose pads and temple tips that become tackier with moisture, helping keep your shades securely on your face.
short_description: With raw, understated fashion, the Spy Cutter Interchangeable Sunglasses offer technologically advanced performance for a wide range of outdoor activities and light conditions.
